name: Galaxy Run - Cosmic Challenge
description:
You've crash landed on an unknown planet...

In a distant galaxy... 

Far, far away from home... 

As you exit your ship, you notice people just like you! 

And you notice others who were ONCE like you...

You are the only chosen one who can yield the power of these magic potions...

It's up to you to yield this great power 

For your very survival is counting on it.........

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use your reflexes to tap on your screen and jump high in the sky! 

Watch out for the blobs! 

For they were once like you until the "mutation" happened...

Tip: Timing is key... Best of Luck!
